"Rost6v!" 
"What?" he answered, not recognizing Boris. 
"I say, we've been in the front line! Our reg- iment attacked!" said Boris with the happy smile seen on the faces of young men who have been under fire for the first time. 
Rost6v stopped. 
"Have you?" he said. "Well, how did it go?"
